skins.shipDescription: Takao-class heavy cruiser number four ¨C Choukai.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the fourth ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Choukai. As the former flagship of the 8th Fleet, I took part in many campaigns. Commander, you can entrust any task to me!
skins.acquisition: I'm Maya's sister, Choukai. I'm so glad to meet you. Um, by the way, we seem to have met before somewhere...
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. I've taken the liberties of preparing your documents. Um... would you also like to have some refreshments?
skins.details: Um, do I ever get bored...? Not particularly. Even if I'm not really doing anything, I enjoy getting to spend time with you, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you're truly a kind person...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, you should pick a day when you're not too busy to come look at the dandelions with me.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, are you not well rested? As a matter of fact, I've actually been hard at work learning how to give massages, just to prepare for this moment! Here, don't be shy~
skins.secretaryTouch: Shall we go for a stroll before the sun goes down?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander, if that is what you so desire, then...
